executive_summary: Frontend focused Software Developer % with profiency in leveraging web and cross platform development tools (React ecosystem) for web and mobile applications.
A divergent thinker with the temperament to assimilate recent technologies and frameworks to solve real world problems.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
summary: Designed, developed, and delivered frontend code to support new features and enhancements for government decision support data analytics application in an agile environment.
Translated high level requirements to wireframes, mockups and designing frontend architecture.
Collabrated and designed on RESTful API endpoints driven by frontend needs.
Tech Stack Utilized: React.js, React Hooks, React-Redux, React Router, Ruby On Rails, Capybara (For UX/UI and integration tests), AWS

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
summary: Co-founded start up which provides customers with a mobile app (iOS and Android) that allows them to store their Tradable Card collection (YuGiOh Tradable Cards).
Designed, developed and delivered various features and enhancements towards the application.
Designed and architected a product recognition algorithm and its associated image database primarly for Tradable Card detection on iOS and Android devices.
Developed and implemented automated data gathering and harvesting tools for image processing and database dumps.
Tech Stack Utilized: React.js , React Native, React-Redux, OpenCV, SQLite, XCode, Andriod Studio, AWS, Firebase
Redesigned and overhauled the monitor software from the ground up.
Designed and implemented automatic local database (scanner image database and sqlite database) updates that are separate from app updates.
